name: Puzzle Pieces of a Photograph
description:
█████ loses her memory and reminisces on her 1999 memories about her ex-girlfriend, and though futile, hopes that destiny will reunite them.

Content warning!!! Transphobia, biphobia, homophobia and in general, queerphobia. Also, death of a family member. 

Happy Pride Month 2021! 

A game by PTCVBF made using a game-making software by Adam Le Doux, Bitsy ( ledoux.itch.io/bitsy ) for GMTK Game Jam 2021 for fun. Made under 48 hours for the topic "Joined Together".

Thanks so much all! Hope you enjoy!

:PTCVBF Phoenix
